personalInfo.education: University of South Alabama (2006, Organizational Communications)

tourBios.carHigh: 2012: Rookie on the Web.com Tour. 2008: Won the Bentonville Open on the Hooters Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: 2001 Wales school champion...Under-15 Welsh Champion...Helped South Alabama win the Sun Belt Conference Championship his senior season.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill outside of golf is the Liverpool Football Club...Never travels without his wallet...Currently drives a Ford Focus...Favorite websites are bbc.co.uk, facebook.com and youtube.com...Favorite college team is the South Alabama Jaguars...Favorite book is The Da Vinci Code. Favorite food is sushi. Favorite city to visit is New York, and his favorite vacation spot is Hawaii. Favorite gadget is his iPhone. Keeps a peanut butter and jelly sandwich in his golf bag...Oldest club in bag is his putter (three years)...Would round out his dream foursome with Tiger Woods, Stephen Fry and Angelina Jolie...Not many know that he is a vegetarian...Bucket list includes visiting the Great Wall of China and Egypt's pyramids. He would also like to run a marathon.

tourBios.carHigh: 2012: Rookie on the Web.com Tour. 2008: Won the Bentonville Open on the Hooters Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: 2001 Wales school champion...Under-15 Welsh Champion...Helped South Alabama win the Sun Belt Conference Championship his senior season.

Favorite food is sushi. Favorite city to visit is New York, and his favorite vacation spot is Hawaii. Favorite gadget is his iPhone. Keeps a peanut butter and jelly sandwich in his golf bag...Oldest club in bag is his putter (three years)...Would round out his dream foursome with Tiger Woods, Stephen Fry and Angelina Jolie...Not many know that he is a vegetarian...Bucket list includes visiting the Great Wall of China and Egypt's pyramids. He would also like to run a marathon.

tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Was T34 at California's Q-School, earning conditional status...Carded his first top-10 with a T8 at The Players Cup.
tourBios.personal: Favorite pro sports' team is Liverpool Football Club...Favorite athletes to watch are Roger Federer and Lionel Messi...Dream foursome would include Tiger Woods, Rory McIlroy and Lee Trevino.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T8th in 2015 at the The Players Cup.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 68th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
